channel.title: journal on single plot
channel.description: Recent content in journal on single plot

item.title: a trip to myrtle creek
item.description: Back in March, I went camping with a few friends down at Myrtle Creek. We found a beautiful watering hole where we mostly posted up drinking a few beers and having dips in the water. Admiring the sunset. A very amused Xander. The watering hole.

item.title: a foray into photography
item.description: I am now a proud owner of a Fujifilm XT-5. Whilst most of my shots have been mediocre at best, it is pretty hard to take a bad shot with it. Here’s my first picture.
